meta_description: The Montreal Museum of Fine Arts, a bold, innovative and caring museum that is welcoming to all disciplines such as the visual arts, history and science.

**WEDNESDAY EVENINGS**  
On Wednesday evenings from 5 to 9 p.m., the permanent collections are not open to the public. Enjoy discounted admission to a selection of exhibitions. [See what’s on view](https://www.mbam.qc.ca/en/tickets/#exhibitions-and-collections-38627).
